p: Several authors have reported different compositions of essential oils obtained from different plant species ( Govindrajan 2010, Senthilkumar and Venkatesalu, 2010, Zhu et al. 2011, 2012, Rajkumar et al. 2011, Intirach et al. 2012, Liu et al. 2012 and Senthilkumar et al. 2013). The plants show significant variations, both in terms of number and percentage composition, of different constituents in essential oil and it appears to be the characteristics of a particular plant.
